alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:34AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Atascosa, southwestern Wilson and south central Bexar Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 934 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Leming, or 12 miles southwest of Floresville, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Floresville, Poteet, Elmendorf, Leming, Sandy Oaks, Coughran, Espey, Canada Verde, Graytown and Braunig Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
